name: Escape Sequence (itch)
description:
Grab control and make your way out of .. umm, never mind, it's just a platformer.
Jump around and do usual platformer things.

Game is probably somewhat hard. Do not panic!

-- 

Notes:

- Sometimes the HTML5 player above doesn't get focus properly, mostly in Firefox. Click inside the game after you hit fullscreen, and if hitting Enter does nothing, reload the page. (It's loaded faster the second time)

Authors:

lucak (art)
TwinkleNoodle (music & sfx)
yscik (coding & design)

Created for Meta Game Jam 2018.
